item.title: Box Office Preview: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Singalong Books Over 1,700 Cinemas, 1,000 Shows Sell Out
item.description: Netflix is hosting the special two-day event in North America over the Aug. 22-24 weekend. The singalong will also play in theaters in the U.K., Australia and New Zealand.
